metadata.title: CVE-2012-5644 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
libuser has information disclosure when moving user's home directory

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-5644` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libuser - 1:0.60~dfsg-1.2
libuser1 - 1:0.60~dfsg-1.2
python-libuser - 1:0.60~dfsg-1.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libuser package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:0.60~dfsg-1.2').
